description:
Onihime and Momoko fight over a fragment, but Momoko loses an important charm during the fight.  Momoko and her friends look hard but can`t find it.  At first Onihime makes fun of her but then she feels responsible.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Soushitsu Kiki!? Momoko no Taisetsu na Mono
喪失危機!? 桃子の大切なモノ
